ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_01_10:
To establish a bond, I have to... Hi-yah!
Whew...
That’s enough for today!
ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_02_10: Sorry, I’m trying something out here!
ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_03_10:
When a Trainer and their Pokémon make 
a real bond as a sync pair, an amazing 
special move will activate...or so I hear!
ch0073_00_karate/2701_0701_04_10: Right now, I’m training to activate it! Hi-yah!
ch0073_00_karate/2701_0702_01_10:
Apparently these special moves have 
different effects depending on 
the sync pair that uses them.
ch0073_00_karate/2701_0702_02_10:
Almost like the bond that is born from the clash
of spirit to spirit and fist to fist!
ch0073_00_karate/2701_0702_03_10: So, the key must be found in training! Hi-yah!
ch0073_00_karate/2702_1031_01_10:
An opponent with such
high defenses...
ch0073_00_karate/2702_1031_02_10:
We’ve trained to
handle opponents
with low defenses!
ch0073_00_karate/2702_0701_01_10:
A good offense is the greatest strength!
It’s what my Pokémon and I train for every day!
ch0073_00_karate/2702_0701_02_10:
Because we train our offense so much, low
defenses are no challenge! Battle us whenever!
ch0073_00_karate/2702_0701_03_10:
But an opponent with BIG defenses makes things
difficult! That’s our biggest weakness!
ch0073_00_karate/2702_0702_01_10:
When you master one thing, another becomes
your weakness.
ch0073_00_karate/2702_0702_02_10:
And recently, all of the opponents that challenge
me have had very high defense!
ch0073_00_karate/2702_0702_03_10:
High defenses are my weakness!
How does everybody know my weakness!
ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_01_10:
I’m going to train in the fiercest of rain or the
scorchiest of heat!
ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_03_10:
I finally met my idol, the Karate King!
And not only did he battle me—he even
gave me a Pokémon!
ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_04_10:
I am at the peak of happiness!
I’d follow him for life!
ch0073_00_karate/2703_0701_05_10:
That is...if I hadn’t lost sight of him!
So instead, I just started training again.
ch0073_00_karate/2703_0702_01_10: You can train anywhere and anytime!
ch0073_00_karate/2703_0702_02_10:
This Pokémon isn’t the only thing I got from the
Karate King, after all! Life lessons count, too!
ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_01_10:
You, human that uses Pokémon...
Can you understand my words?
ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_03_10:
Ha ha ha! I surprised you, didn’t I!
I was actually in a movie a long time ago!
ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_04_10:
It wasn’t an easy gig for anyone, but the lead
actor was amazing!
ch0073_00_karate/2704_0701_05_10:
The movie didn’t exactly go according to script,
but he never gave up and kept redoing his shots.
I consider him my mentor!
ch0073_00_karate/2704_0702_01_10:
I make sure to train as both a Trainer and an
actor every day!
ch0073_00_karate/2704_0702_02_10: But whenever I’m acting, nobody talks to me!
ch0073_00_karate/2751_1031_01_10:
Come on, now.
You’re trying to overcome
this, aren’t you?
ch0073_00_karate/2751_1031_03_10:
It’ll be OK, though!
Don’t worry about it!
ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_02_10:
Come on, buddy! I’m here with you! We’ll get
through this together!
ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_03_10:
A long time ago...when I was still a
security guard for the gift shop...
ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_04_10:
Uh...yeah.
You told me that part already.
ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_05_10:
A frighteningly strong opponent...
But it was because of that that I decided to
try to reach the top!
ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_06_10:
Yeah, that’s the ticket! I’ll help you, too!
You’ll be fine, buddy!
ch0073_00_karate/2751_0701_07_10: But I’m still scared of Hyper Beam!
ch0073_00_karate/1901_0101_01_10: I just won a battle, so I’m feeling good!
ch0073_00_karate/1901_0501_02_10:
Oh, whatever!
I’m in a terrible mood now!
ch0073_00_karate/1901_0601_01_10: I think I’m gonna go to bed...
ch0073_00_karate/1901_0601_02_10:
I’m not strong enough to be able to get right
back up and try again.
ch0073_00_karate/1901_0601_03_10:
Uh, well, you know...
I’m grateful for you battling me!
ch0073_00_karate/1902_0101_01_10:
Muahaha! My hobby is to beat Trainers on their
way to what lies ahead!
ch0073_00_karate/1902_0601_01_10:
Rather than enjoying defeating someone, should I
aim higher?
ch0073_00_karate/1902_0601_02_10:
It’s probably people with that kind of attitude
who gather for the PML.
ch0073_00_karate/1903_0101_01_10: Err... I wasn’t sleeping! Let’s battle!
ch0073_00_karate/1903_0501_02_10:
This can’t be happening!
This must be a dream!
ch0073_00_karate/1903_0601_01_10:
I was careless, but being half-asleep isn’t
a good enough excuse!
ch0073_00_karate/1903_0601_02_10:
I mean...I wasn’t asleep!
I swear! It’s not true!
